bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Crash warnings on GRC load and the application eventually crashes too, when any source block property values are changed.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): gr-osmosdr-0.1.3-18.20141023git42c66fdd.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open GRC 2. Add Osmocom or RTL-SDR source block 3. Open block properties, change any value and click "OK"
Actual results: Application crashes.
Expected results: Value is changed.
Additional info: $ gnuradio-companion <<< Welcome to GNU Radio Companion 3.7.9.1 >>>
Preferences file: /home/***/.gnuradio/grc.conf Block paths: /usr/local/share/gnuradio/grc/blocks /usr/share/gnuradio/grc/blocks /home/***/.grc_gnuradio
Showing: "" Warning: restarting the docstring loader (crashed while loading 'osmosdr_sink') Warning: restarting the docstring loader (crashed while loading 'osmosdr_source') Warning: restarting the docstring loader (crashed while loading 'uhd_amsg_source') Warning: restarting the docstring loader (crashed while loading 'uhd_usrp_sink') Warning: restarting the docstring loader (crashed while loading 'uhd_usrp_source') Warning: docstring loader crashed too often Segmentation fault (core dumped)
